page.title: 16TAKING PHOTOGRAPHS
page.content: On Tuesday June 4th 1985 we walked down Coppice Hill to take some photos of the views.At the chair factory we photographed the delivery van,which is a replica of a 1930's van,the owner came out and lent us some bowler hats to make the picture look better.Then we walked along the canal tow path which led us to the Roundhouse. After that we walked up Marle Hill and back up to school. Then we all got into the cars and went on the road to Cirencester,up Cowcombe Hill,and we took a photo of a church.Next we went to Oakridge and France Lynch and took a lot of photos. After all this it was time to go back to school for lunch.Some of the photos will be used in this Domesday Project.
